item.description:
Barn Blast

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE: Deeg is cancelling this ride due to the possibility of showers. It will be rescheduled.

Burning rubber to Parker's Maple Barn in New Hampshire for lunch

see club website at www.newenglandthunder.com for all club info, membership, ride calendar and photo gallery

item.name: Barn Blast- cancelled due to unsettled weather
